title: Time Magazine USA - 23 February 2015 (gnv64)

HOW OLD CAN WE LIVE TO BE?
That remains to be seen, but if a promising drug does to humans what it does to miceÃ¢â‚¬â€a big ifÃ¢â‚¬â€the answer is 142. Mice have a median survival time of 27 MONTHS, but with treatment, the longest-living mouse hit 48 MONTHS, a life 1.77 TIMES LONGER. The median human lifespan is 80 YEARSÃ¢â‚¬â€so if the oldest person lived 1.77 times longer, he or she would reach 142.
